text: Is the base.html file not allowed to utilize any asset outside of the theme? I know for assets in the theme that it needs to be a relative URL, but confirming if everything outside is off limits now. I’m getting a validation error… but the file the error message I get is actually incorrect. It’s referencing a file that isn’t even part of my theme, but trying to track down what’s really the issue. This is the main validation system, not the CLI.
